name: Club
description: A simple wooden melee weapon with the light property.

name: Dagger
description: A small blade with finesse, light, and thrown properties.

name: Greatclub
description: A massive two-handed wooden club.

name: Handaxe
description: A light axe suitable for chopping or throwing.

name: Javelin
description: A light spear designed for throwing.

name: Light Hammer
description: A small hammer with light and thrown properties.

name: Mace
description: A heavy metal head on a sturdy handle.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A simple length of wood that is versatile (1d8).

name: Sickle
description: A farming tool adapted for combat with the light property.

name: Spear
description: A polearm that can be thrown or used with two hands (1d8).

name: Light Crossbow
description: A two-handed ranged weapon with the loading property.

name: Dart
description: A small ranged weapon with finesse and thrown properties.

name: Shortbow
description: A two-handed bow.

name: Sling
description: A simple leather strip used to hurl stones.

name: Battleaxe
description: A martial axe that is versatile (1d10).

name: Flail
description: A striking weapon consisting of a metal ball on a chain.

name: Glaive
description: A heavy polearm with heavy, reach, and two-handed properties.

name: Greataxe
description: A massive axe with heavy and two-handed properties.

name: Greatsword
description: A massive sword with heavy and two-handed properties.

name: Halberd
description: A polearm with an axe head; has heavy, reach, and two-handed properties.

name: Lance
description: A reach weapon that requires two hands when not mounted.

name: Longsword
description: A martial blade with the versatile (1d10) property.

name: Maul
description: A massive hammer with heavy and two-handed properties.

name: Morningstar
description: A spiked metal club.

name: Pike
description: A very long spear with heavy, reach, and two-handed properties.

name: Rapier
description: A thin blade with the finesse property.

name: Scimitar
description: A curved blade with finesse and light properties.

name: Shortsword
description: A straight blade with finesse and light properties.

name: Trident
description: A three-pronged spear with thrown and versatile (1d8) properties.

name: War Pick
description: A martial weapon with a heavy piercing point.

name: Warhammer
description: A martial hammer with the versatile (1d10) property.

name: Whip
description: A lash with finesse and reach properties.

name: Blowgun
description: A ranged weapon with the loading property.

name: Hand Crossbow
description: A small crossbow with light and loading properties.

name: Heavy Crossbow
description: A large crossbow with heavy, loading, and two-handed properties.

name: Longbow
description: A large bow with heavy and two-handed properties.

name: Net
description: A thrown weapon that restrains a target but deals no damage.

name: Padded Armor
description: Light armor consisting of quilted layers of cloth and batting (AC 11 + Dex).

name: Leather Armor
description: Light armor made of stiffened leather (AC 11 + Dex).

name: Studded Leather Armor
description: Light armor reinforced with close-set rivets (AC 12 + Dex).

name: Hide Armor
description: Medium armor made from thick furs and pelts (AC 12 + Dex, max 2).

name: Chain Shirt
description: Medium armor consisting of interlocking metal rings (AC 13 + Dex, max 2).

name: Scale Mail
description: Medium armor consisting of overlapping metal scales (AC 14 + Dex, max 2).

name: Breastplate
description: Medium armor fitted to the chest (AC 14 + Dex, max 2).

name: Half Plate
description: Medium armor consisting of shaped metal plates (AC 15 + Dex, max 2).

name: Ring Mail
description: Heavy armor made of leather with heavy metal rings (AC 14).

name: Chain Mail
description: Heavy armor made of interlocking metal rings (AC 16).

name: Splint Armor
description: Heavy armor made of vertical strips of metal riveted to backing (AC 17).

name: Plate Armor
description: Heavy armor consisting of shaped, interlocking metal plates (AC 18).

name: Shield
description: A shield made from wood or metal (+2 Armor Class).

name: Burglar's Pack
description: A collection of gear focused on stealth and infiltration, including a backpack, bag of 1,000 ball bearings, 10 feet of string, a bell, 5 candles, crowbar, hammer, 10 pitons, hooded lantern, 2 flasks of oil, 5 days of rations, tinderbox, and waterskin.

name: Dungeoneer's Pack
description: A collection of gear focused on underground exploration, including a backpack, crowbar, hammer, 10 pitons, 10 torches, tinderbox, 50 feet of hempen rope, 5 days of rations, and a waterskin.

name: Explorer's Pack
description: A collection of gear focused on wilderness travel, including a backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, and a waterskin, and 50 feet of hempen rope.

name: Priest's Pack
description: A collection of gear focused on religious duties, including a backpack, blanket, 10 candles, tinderbox, an alms box, 2 blocks of incense, a censer, vestments, 2 days of rations, and a waterskin.

name: Scholar's Pack
description: A collection of gear focused on study, including a backpack, a notebook, ink and ink pen, a bottle of parchment, a little bag of sand, and a small knife.

name: Arrows (20)
description: A bundle of 20 pieces of standard ammunition for a shortbow or longbow.

name: Bolts, Crossbow (20)
description: A bundle of 20 pieces of standard ammunition for any crossbow.

name: Needles, Blowgun (50)
description: A container of 50 small projectiles used by a blowgun.

name: Backpack
description: A sturdy canvas bag with shoulder straps, capable of holding up to 30 pounds or 1 cubic foot of gear.

name: Sack
description: A simple cloth bag capable of holding up to 1 cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear.

name: Bedroll
description: A stuffed cloth covering used for sleeping in a comfortable manner.

name: Blanket
description: A standard wool covering used for warmth.

name: Rope, Hempen (50 ft.)
description: Fifty feet of strong, coarse hemp rope, which has 2 hit points and can be broken with a DC 17 Strength check.

name: Rope, Silk (50 ft.)
description: Fifty feet of finely woven silk rope, which has 4 hit points and can be broken with a DC 20 Strength check.

name: Rations (1 day)
description: Dry food sufficient to sustain one creature for one day.

name: Waterskin
description: A leather pouch capable of holding 4 pints of water or other liquid; listed weight is empty.

name: Climber's Kit
description: A set of special pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness that grants advantage on checks made to climb.

name: Thieves' Tools
description: A set of tools used to pick locks and disarm traps.

name: Tinderbox
description: Contains flint, steel, and tinder used to start a fire.

name: Torch
description: A stick with a rag wrapped around one end that burns for 1 hour, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

name: Oil (flask)
description: A liquid used to fuel a lamp or lantern, or can be used as a thrown weapon to coat creatures or objects with flammable oil.

name: Lantern, Hooded
description: A light source that casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet; requires oil to burn.

name: Lantern, Bullseye
description: A light source that casts bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet; requires oil to burn.

name: Alchemist's Supplies
description: Includes beakers, bottles, bellows, and other items necessary to create alchemical items.

name: Brewer's Supplies
description: Includes three glass jugs, a fermenting vat, a large pot, hydrometer, and other equipment used to brew ale and beer.

name: Calligrapher's Supplies
description: A set of parchment, inks, pens, and seals used for copying documents and writing in a beautiful hand.

name: Carpenter's Tools
description: Includes a saw, hammer, nails, and other implements used for woodworking.

name: Cartographer's Tools
description: A set of parchment, pens, ink, dividers, and a compass used for drawing maps.

name: Cobbler's Tools
description: Tools including a hammer, lasts, an awl, and other equipment necessary to make and repair shoes.

name: Cook's Utensils
description: Includes a pot, iron skillet, cutlery, and other items used for preparing meals.

name: Glassblower's Tools
description: Includes a blowpipe, glass cutters, and molds used for shaping glass.

name: Jeweler's Tools
description: Includes a small hammer and pliers, needles, and a file used for working with precious metals and gems.

name: Leatherworker's Tools
description: Includes cutters, punches, and thread necessary to work and repair leather.

name: Manacles
description: Iron restraints used to bind a Small or Medium creature; breaking them requires a DC 20 Strength check.

name: Crowbar
description: A simple piece of iron that grants advantage on Strength checks made to break things.

name: Iron Spikes (10)
description: A set of 10 long, heavy metal spikes for securing rope or barring doors.

name: Hammer
description: A standard tool for driving nails or pitons.

name: Pitons (10)
description: A set of 10 small metal spikes used for securing ropes while climbing.

name: Fishing Tackle
description: Includes a wooden rod, line, hooks, and sinkers necessary for catching fish.

name: Hourglass
description: A device used to measure the passage of time.

name: Mirror, Steel
description: A small, polished steel mirror used for reflection or checking corners.

name: Magnifying Glass
description: A glass lens that provides advantage on checks made to examine small or highly detailed objects.

name: Holy Symbol (Amulet)
description: A symbol of a deity or religious order, typically worn around the neck.

name: Holy Symbol (Emblem)
description: A symbol of a deity or religious order, typically engraved or inlaid on a shield or armor.

name: Holy Symbol (Reliquary)
description: A small box or container holding a sacred relic.

name: Spellbook (blank)
description: A leather-bound book containing 100 blank parchment pages for a wizard to record spells.

name: Vials (empty)
description: A small glass or ceramic bottle for holding liquid.

name: Ink, 1 oz. bottle
description: A standard bottle containing one ounce of black or colored ink.

name: Ink Pen
description: A simple writing implement, such as a quill or reed pen.

name: Axe, Woodchopper's
description: A common tool used for felling trees and chopping wood (mechanically functions as a non-combat handaxe).

name: Chain (10 ft.)
description: Ten feet of metal chain, with 10 hit points, that can be broken with a successful DC 20 Strength check.

name: Shovel
description: A common tool used for digging and earthwork.

name: Lock
description: A standard lock that can be opened with its key or by a successful DC 15 Dexterity check using thieves' tools.

name: Key
description: A simple metal key used to open a specific lock.

name: Hunting Trap
description: A heavy metal trap that can restrain creatures.

name: Whetstone
description: A block used for sharpening blades and points.

name: Mess Kit
description: A tin box containing a cup and simple cutlery.

name: Book (blank)
description: A book with a protective cover and 100 blank pages of vellum.

name: Soap
description: A bar of soap used for cleaning.

name: Tent, two-person
description: A canvas shelter capable of sleeping two Medium creatures.

name: Potion of Healing
description: A crimson liquid that restores 2d4 + 2 hit points when consumed.

name: Scroll Case
description: A tube used for protecting scrolls, maps, or other rolled papers.

name: Healer's Kit
description: A pouch containing bandages and salves that allows 10 uses to stabilize a creature without a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

name: Bottle, Glass (empty)
description: A simple glass container for holding liquids.

name: Holy Water (flask)
description: Water blessed by a cleric; deals 2d6 radiant damage to fiends or undead when splashed on them.

name: Potion of Climbing
description: Grants a climbing speed equal to walking speed for 1 hour.

name: Cap of Water Breathing
description: Allows the wearer to breathe underwater while wearing this soft hat.

name: Cloak of Billowing
description: A cloak that dramatically billows outward when the wearer desires it.

name: Philter of Love
description: A potion that makes the drinker charmed by the first person they see within 10 minutes for 1 hour.

name: Unbreakable Arrow
description: A piece of ammunition that magically repairs itself if broken or damaged.

name: Bag of Holding
description: A seemingly ordinary cloth bag with an extradimensional space that can hold up to 500 pounds or 64 cubic feet of material.

name: Cloak of Protection
description: A cloak that grants a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while worn and attuned.

name: Weapon +1 (Longsword)
description: A longsword that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
description: A potion that restores 4d4 + 4 hit points when consumed.

name: Adamantine Armor (Plate)
description: Heavy armor that turns any critical hit against the wearer into a normal hit.

name: Immovable Rod
description: A heavy rod that, when a button is pressed, becomes fixed in place until the button is pressed again.

name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
description: Allows the attuned wearer to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and ceilings while leaving their hands free.

name: Wand of Magic Detection
description: A wand with 3 charges that allows the wielder to cast the *detect magic* spell.

name: Goggles of Night
description: A pair of goggles that grant the wearer darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

name: Sentinel Shield
description: A shield that grants the wielder advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks.

name: Javelin of Lightning
description: A javelin that deals 5d6 extra lightning damage when thrown and transforms into a lightning bolt.

name: Stone of Good Luck (Ioun Stone)
description: While orbiting your head, this stone grants a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

name: Wand of the War Mage +1
description: An attuned wand that grants a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with spells and ignores half cover.

name: Amulet of Health
description: An amulet that sets the wearer's Constitution score to 19 while attuned.

name: Brooch of Shielding
description: A brooch that grants resistance to force damage and immunity to the damage from the *magic missile* spell.

name: Dust of Disappearance
description: A handful of dust that, when scattered, turns creatures in a 10-foot radius invisible for 2d4 minutes.

name: Elemental Gem (Earth)
description: A gem that can be shattered to summon a powerful elemental servant for 1 hour.

name: Elixir of Health
description: A shimmering liquid that instantly cures any disease or poison affecting the drinker.

name: Pipes of the Sewers
description: A set of pipes that can be played to summon and charm rats.

name: Ring of Swimming
description: A ring that grants the wearer a swimming speed equal to their walking speed.

name: Rope of Climbing
description: A 60-foot rope that can be commanded to ascend, descend, or knot itself.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
description: Boots that make the wearer's steps silent, granting advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
description: A cloak that makes the attuned wearer invisible to creatures relying on darkvision in darkness, and grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

name: Periapt of Health
description: A necklace that renders the attuned wearer immune to all diseases.

name: Lantern of Revealing
description: A hooded lantern that, when lit, sheds light and reveals invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet.

name: Ring of Mind Shielding
description: A ring that makes the wearer immune to having their thoughts read and protects their soul after death.

name: Restorative Ointment
description: A container of five doses of ointment, each of which cures one disease or neutralizes one poison.

name: Trident of Fish Command
description: A magical trident that grants the wielder the ability to cast *dominate beast* on aquatic creatures up to three times per day.

name: Wand of Web
description: A wand with 7 charges that can be used to cast the 2nd-level *web* spell.

name: Winged Boots
description: Boots that grant the attuned wearer a flying speed of 45 feet, usable in spurts.

name: Armor +1 (Plate)
description: Plate armor that grants a +1 bonus to the wearer's Armor Class.

name: Weapon +2 (Longsword)
description: A longsword that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Potion of Superior Healing
description: A potion that restores 8d4 + 8 hit points when consumed.

name: Ring of Protection
description: A ring that grants a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while worn and attuned.

name: Ring of Evasion
description: A ring that grants the attuned wearer the ability to use their reaction to succeed on a failed Dexterity saving throw up to three times per day.

name: Ring of Feather Falling
description: A ring that causes the wearer to fall at a rate of 60 feet per round and take no falling damage.

name: Cloak of the Bat
description: A cloak that allows the attuned wearer to fly in darkness and transform into a bat.

name: Cube of Force
description: A small cube that creates an invisible wall of force on one or more of its sides.

name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
description: A small pouch of dust that, when scattered, causes creatures to suffer debilitating sneezing and choking fits.

name: Efficient Quiver
description: A quiver that has three separate extradiemensional compartments for holding arrows, bolts, and javelins.

name: Flame Tongue (Longsword)
description: A sword that bursts into flames on command, dealing an extra 2d6 fire damage on a hit.

name: Helm of Telepathy
description: A helm that allows the attuned wearer to communicate telepathically and cast the *detect thoughts* spell at will.

name: Horn of Valhalla (Silver/Brass)
description: A horn that summons 2d4 + 2 berserkers to fight for the wielder for 1 hour.

name: Instruments of the Bards (Canaith Mandolin)
description: A beautifully crafted mandolin that grants the attuned user the ability to cast several spells.

name: Ioun Stone of Protection
description: A polished sphere that orbits the head and grants a +1 bonus to the attuned creature's AC.

name: Mace of Disruption
description: A mace that deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage to fiends and undead.

name: Pearl of Power
description: A pearl that allows the attuned user to regain one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower once per day.

name: Periapt of Wound Closure
description: A necklace that stabilizes the attuned wearer automatically when dying and doubles the hit points restored by healing spells.

name: Ring of the Ram
description: A ring that allows the attuned wearer to project a magical ram that deals force damage.

name: Staff of the Python
description: A wooden staff that can be used to cast the *speak with animals* spell and transform into a giant python once per day.

name: Staff of the Woodlands
description: A staff that can be used as a *shillelagh* and has multiple charges for nature-based spells.

name: Sword of Life Stealing
description: A sword that, on a critical hit, deals an extra 10 necrotic damage and heals the wielder for that same amount.

name: Wand of Fireballs
description: A wand with 7 charges that can be used to cast the 3rd-level *fireball* spell.

name: Boots of Striding and Springing
description: Boots that increase the wearer's walking speed to 30 feet and triple their jumping distance.

name: Vicious Weapon (Longsword)
description: A weapon that, on a critical hit, deals an extra 7 damage of the weapon's type.

name: Bracers of Archery
description: Bracers that grant the attuned wearer proficiency with longbows and shortbows, and a +2 bonus to damage rolls with them.

name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
description: A cloak that allows the wearer to breathe underwater and grants a swimming speed of 60 feet.

name: Decanter of Endless Water
description: A stoppered flask that can produce fresh or salt water in various quantities or a powerful blast.

name: Dust of Dryness
description: A dust that can absorb great amounts of water, or turn into a marble that can summon the water back.

name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
description: A helm that allows the attuned wearer to cast the *comprehend languages* spell at will.

name: Horseshoes of Speed (Set of 4)
description: A set of four magical horseshoes that double the movement speed of the horse they are equipped to.

name: Knave's Eye Patch
description: An eye patch that grants the attuned wearer advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and Proficiency in Deception.

name: Potion of Poison
description: A murky, thick liquid that acts as a basic poison when consumed, dealing 3d6 poison damage.

name: Potion of Resistance (Fire)
description: A potion that grants the drinker resistance to fire damage for 1 hour.

name: Ring of Water Walking
description: A ring that allows the attuned wearer to stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground.

name: Trident of Warning
description: A trident that warns the attuned wielder of danger, granting advantage on initiative and immunity to being surprised.

name: Dart +1 (Set of 20)
description: A set of twenty darts that grant a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Pipes of Haunting
description: Pipes that can be played to force nearby creatures to make a saving throw or become frightened.

name: Sword of Vengeance
description: A sword that imposes an extra 2 damage on attack rolls, but magically bonds to the wielder and compels them to attack.

name: Shield +1
description: A shield that grants a +1 bonus to the wearer's Armor Class.

name: Ring of Warmth
description: A ring that grants the attuned wearer resistance to cold damage.

name: Saddle of the Cavalier
description: A saddle that prevents the rider from being dismounted against their will if they succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw.

name: Ammunition +1 (20 pieces)
description: A set of twenty pieces of magical ammunition (like arrows or bolts) that grant a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Sustaining Spoon
description: A spoon that, once per day, produces a bowl of thick, nourishing stew when placed into an empty pot.

name: Wand of Secrets
description: A wand with 3 charges that, when expended, reveals the location of hidden doors or traps within 30 feet.

name: Potion of Heroism
description: A potion that grants the drinker 10 temporary hit points and the effects of the *bless* spell for 1 hour.

name: Oil of Slipperiness
description: A vial of oil that can be applied to grant advantage on Dexterity saving throws and checks made to escape grapples, or can be used to coat a surface.

name: Universal Solvent
description: A vial of liquid that dissolves any type of adhesive or non-magical sealant, including *sovereign glue*.

name: Scroll of Protection (Undead)
description: A scroll that creates an immobile, invisible barrier around the reader that blocks certain creatures, such as undead.

name: Spell Scroll (3rd level)
description: A magical scroll containing a single 3rd-level spell that can be cast by reading the writing.
